item.title: Create Your Own Blog With Hugo and Github Pages
item.description: In this post we will explore how we can setup our own blog using Hugo which claims to be “The world’s fastest framework for building websites”. And for hosting, we will use Github pages and automatic deployments using Github Actions workflow. So let’s get started, shall we? The Github.io Repository If you have a Github.com account, you can create your personal static website easily by creating a special repository with name "<your-github-user-name>.
